    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Board
     
    Brick
     
    BrickGenerator
    Strategy interface for supplying tetromino instances to the board.
    BrickRotator
    Manages rotation state for a single tetromino, exposing the current orientation and the next rotation as view data.
    ClearRow
     
    DownData
     
    EventSource
     
    EventType
     
    GameConfig
    GameConfig - Static configuration class for game settings.
    GameController
    Orchestrates core Tetris gameplay, translating input events into board updates, managing scoring and level progression, and notifying the UI controller of state changes and game outcomes.
    GameController.Shard
    Particle effect representing a single shard emitted from a cleared block.
    GameController.WhiteFlash
    Visual effect representing a brief white flash across a cleared row.
    GameOverPanel
     
    GameTest
     
    GuiController
     
    HighScoreManager
    Manages persistent storage and retrieval of the player's high score using a simple text file in the local file system.
    IBrick
     
    InputEventListener
     
    JBrick
     
    LBrick
     
    LevelCompletePanel
     
    LevelConfig
     
    LevelFailedPanel
     
    LevelManager
    Coordinates level-based gameplay, tracking the active level, block and score requirements, and integrating with LevelProgressManager to honor which levels are unlocked.
    LevelProgressManager
    Persists and restores the player's level progression so that unlocked levels remain available across game sessions.
    LevelSelectionPanel
     
    Main
     
    MatrixOperations
     
    MoveEvent
     
    NextShapeInfo
     
    NotificationPanel
     
    OBrick
     
    PauseMenuPanel
     
    RandomBrickGenerator
    Default implementation of BrickGenerator that produces a random sequence of tetrominoes and maintains a short queue used for the "Next" piece preview.
    SBrick
     
    Score
     
    SettingsPanel
     
    SimpleBoard
     
    SoundManager
    Singleton manager responsible for loading and controlling background music and sound effects for the game.
    TBrick
     
    TetrominoFactory
    Factory class for creating random Tetromino (Brick) instances.
    ViewData
     
    ZBrick
